pages.text: When placed on $(item)Mob Spawners/$, this item $(thing)agitates/$ the spawner:$(li)It will prevent spawned entities despawning when the player leaves the area.$(li)The spawner will keep spawning while the player is not in the area.$(p)Mob farm anyone?$(p)$(thing)Sneak-right-click/$ with a $(l:tools/logistics_configurator)Logistics Configurator/$ or other agitator to remove it.
